name: TABLE TENNIS SIMULATOR: REMASTERED: PROFESSIONAL EDITION: TRIAL COPY
name_original: TABLE TENNIS SIMULATOR: REMASTERED: PROFESSIONAL EDITION: TRIAL COPY
description:
The classic game of skill, except with more bugs and less sounds!

INSTALLATION NOTE:

Windows may tell you that the GameMaker: Studio executable file is potentially dangerous, but this is not the case.

This file is now an executable rather than an installer, which should hopefully make it easier to remove once you get tired of playing it.
